apipieapipies#index.response_data:
• Montecinema 1.0

Another API description

Resources

Movies

Resource Description
GET /movies Shows all movies
GET /movies/:id Shows a detiled information about movie and its next 5 screenings

Offlinereservations
Offline Reservations/ Only for staff members

Resource Description
GET /offline/reservations Display all reservations
GET /offline/reservations/:id Detailed info about reservation
POST /offline/reservations Creates a reservation with tickets
PUT /offline/reservations/:id Changes reservation status from confirmed to paid
DELETE /offline/reservations/:id Deletes reservation

Onlinereservations
ONLINE Reservations

Resource Description
GET /online/reservations Display logged in User's reservations
GET /online/reservations/:id Detailed info about reservation
POST /online/reservations Creates a reservation with tickets
DELETE /online/reservations/:id Deletes reservation if it belongs to logged in User

Screenings

Resource Description
GET /movies/:id/screenings Shows all screenings for movie with given id
GET /movies/:id/screenings/:id Shows a deailed information about screening

Params

optional

reservation[screening_id]
required

required

reservation[status]
required

confirmed or paid

Validations:

  • Must be a String
reservation[tickets]
required

Array of tickets with {price ticket_type seat}

Validations:

  • Must be an Array of nested elements
reservation[tickets][price]
required

Validations:

  • Must be a Float
reservation[tickets][seat]
required

ex. “1A” , 2E

Validations:

  • Must be a String
reservation[tickets][ticket_type]
required

Validations:

  • Must be a String
